text_3.en:
By default, this will create an `Absolute` main layout where all the pages will be rendered. In order to render a page
on a specific layout which you have defined in your app, pass a `parents` object of the form

text_6.en: This will render `page1` on layout `lay1` and `page2` will be rendered on layout `lay2`.

text_9.en:

text_20.en:
Please note that these method is already executed when calling `ui.load()`. Calling it without passing a `Layout` param or
without changing its parent layout is just a waste of time.
